attributes.action: Re home our veterans living on our streets before housing the Afghanistan people
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to help more because its the right thing to do, to let someone put there life in danger for our country. To then let them rout on our streets is just wrong on every level.
attributes.background: I would like our Government to start housing our Veterans who are living on our streets, who some have lost limbs for this country plus alot more. Before housing other people around the world, I know it's nice to help but we have to start caring more for ourselves. The UK people deserve better

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Fund guaranteed housing for armed forces veterans: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585941

Cancel the Afghan citizens’ resettlement scheme: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595224
